body.name: Toshiba Canvio Advance 2TB Portable External Hard Drive USB 3.0, Red - HDTCA20XR3AA
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 17 hrs 38 mins
features: Compact design with stylish, textured finish and color options to fit your lifestyle.
Automatic backup software to easily back up your content (free download, for Windows PC only).
Password protection software to help prevent unauthorized access to your data (free download, for Windows PC only).
body.description: The Canvio Advance portable external hard drive allows creators to do what they do best–anywhere their lives take them–offering high storage capacity, easy access to your stored content and the time-tested reliable performance they need. Featuring a compact design with a stylish, textured finish, the Canvio Advance helps keep your files safe and secure with easy-to-use auto backup and password protection software (free download, for Windows PC only).[Note]:(1) One Terabyte (1TB) means 10{12] = 1,000,000,000,000 bytes using powers of 10. Actual formatted storage capacity may vary. For details, please visit Toshiba's Consumer HDD website.(2) Drive formatted NTFS for Windows PC. Reformatting required for Mac computers. Compatibility may vary depending on user‘s hardware configuration and operating system. (4) Product specifications, colors, features, software, and availability are subject to change without notice. Product images may not reflect the actual product.(5) Software is available via free download that is subject to Toshiba’s standard End User License Agreement. Software is compatible with Windows PC only.

productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 35,799 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Key Features Store It All Step up your storage with up to 4TB(1) capacity so you can take your massive collection of photos, music, and videos with you on the go - and still have space for all your other important files, too. Take Your Pick You create to make a statement. Shouldn’t your equipment shine too? Choose from a selection of vibrant colors in a stylish textured finish, so your portable storage can stand out as much as you do. Create More. Worry Less. Keep your files safe and secure with automatic backup and password protection features. The Toshiba Storage Security and Storage Backup software* makes safeguarding your content easy and hassle-free. (*software is available via free download, for PC only)

Canvio Advance Portable External Hard Drive Whenever and wherever creativity strikes, Canvio Advance offers the space to save your greatest work yet. The drive features easy-to-use backup and security software* and comes in a stylish textured finish with vibrant color options to fit your style. (*software is available via free download, for PC only)

Storage You Can Count On Up to 4TB(1) of storage capacity to easily store your growing files and content. Plus, USB 3.0 & 2.0 compatibility allows for high speed data transfer with no external AC power cord needed. Built To Travel Sleek storage in a compact, easy-to-hold casing with a textured finish and available in multiple vibrant color options, so your storage can step up and stand out — just like you do. Secure Your Data Free downloadable Password Protection Software (for Windows PC only) helps keep your content safe with your own unique password. Safeguard Your Memories Free downloadable Auto Backup Software (for Windows PC only) makes backing up your files a breeze. Storage You Can Count On Built To Travel Secure Your Data Safeguard Your Memories

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast and Handy
reviews.reviewText: It's small and convenient, I bought the largest capacity for a friend who had the same one and broke it. It's pretty durable and can take a couple of hits, just not a huge fall. But overall works really great, fast, and has a super large capacity, would say its worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's light but durable
reviews.reviewText: A good purchase at a good price, works fine with my pc, just what I needed for extra storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for Xbox one Game Storage!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this hard-drive to store additional games for my Xbox one. So far the device works great. I am giving it 5 stars because it does everything I need it to do.Here are some considerations for future purchasers,The usb cord for this hard-drive isn't very long so that's something to keep in mind if you need to string the usb cord behind tv.Speed - I bought this because of the price and large storage. However from my research done before buying, if Speed is important consideration for you then you might want to look at other options.The speed of the device isn't what I would consider lightning fast but it's not slow either. It's just right for what I need - a good all round product that does most things well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job for big files
reviews.reviewText: The External Hard Drive I recently purchased has exceeded my expectations in terms of performance, storage capacity, and overall reliability. Its sleek design not only looks great on my desk but also adds a level of portability that suits my on-the-go lifestyle. The plug-and-play functionality made setup a breeze, and the compatibility with various operating systems was a major plus. With ample storage space, I can easily backup and store all my important files, from large media libraries to essential work documents. The data transfer speeds are impressive, ensuring that accessing and transferring files is a quick and efficient process. The rugged build of the external hard drive provides a sense of durability and security for my valuable data. Whether for backup purposes or expanding storage, this external hard drive has proven to be a reliable and practical investment, making my digital life much more organized and worry-free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value external hard drive!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this hard drive to store a backup of photos and essential files. This does the job perfectly. I’m not in love with the USB 3.0 connector but it is advertised in the product listing. I haven’t noticed an issue with heat, although I am not using it for anything intense. It isn’t too noisy. A great external drive for backup purposes. Four stars because the included software is low-quality (in my opinion) and the provided link didn’t work for me out of the box - had to search around online to try it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great design and very easy to take around! 5/5
reviews.reviewText: it's been about a month since i've been using this and so far, i really like it! imo 1TB is enough for me and this has been good to use to transfer all my games to. it's not complicated and the downloading was easy. i got it in black and the design is really nice. it's fairly small, making it easy to take around as you wish. i recommend this! worth the money imo!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use portable, looks great no problems comes with everything g you need. I'm doing a youtu e channel and this 1tb is great for all my content. Plus the price was just right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid Memory for decent price
reviews.reviewText: Works well, didn't have any issues porting 200+G of data onto the drive for safe keeping!Build seems durable and I don't have any concerns in that area.
Lots of storage quiet. Easy to use
Escogí este disco duro externo porque es Toshiba, una marca que usé varios años en laptops y es muy buena. Un tamaño compacto, un color muy bonito y muy fácil de usar. Un precio muy accesible.
É muito funcional, muito bom costo beneficio. Gostei muito

La durabilidad y confiabilidad a largo plazo son aspectos clave de cualquier unidad de almacenamiento, y este SSD de Toshiba ha superado mis expectativas. No solo sigue funcionando, sino que lo hace en muy buenas condiciones, lo que es impresionante después de casi cuatro años de uso continuo.
